text:
Family Duet [30 May - 5 June]
.
A multigenerational approach to understanding what it means to be a family.
.
What does it mean to be on stage with your grandma? Perform with your sister, or dance with your child? In Family Duet, a multi-generational cast presents an off-beat mix of life experiences and perspectives on the world. .
Find out more and watch this before 5 JUNE! More details at https://www.apart.sg/featured-season-8/thestudios-familyduet
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason8 | @esplanadethestudios
